CustomField.description: To track the AWS spend of a CloudFix user when they connect CloudFix to their AWS account. This might be different from their self reported AWS spend, tracked in the AWS Spend field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To track the AWS spend of a CloudFix user when they connect CloudFix to their AWS account. This might be different from their self reported AWS spend, tracked in the AWS Spend field.
CustomField.label: CloudFix Scanned AWS Spend
